website_summaries.verdict: While not specifically from the Architecture line this gorgeous CREATOR line recreation of one of the world’s architectural wonders that is sure to impress.
pros: This 5,923-piece set brings the 17th Century landmark to life with amazing detail
Features sweeping arches, central dome, balconies and decorative finials
Terrific display piece and one of LEGO’s most challenging sets
cons: Expensive and definitely for expert builders

customer_reviews.title: Amazing detail
customer_reviews.text: Many many hours to build this, but the detail is incredible, for any LEGO fan this is a great build. Loved them when I was a kid, never grew out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Koscik

customer_reviews.title: My wife is loving this monster Lego set!
customer_reviews.text: My wife received this lego set for Christmas and has been looking forward to putting it together for a few weeks now. Finally a week ago she started on it. She loves putting together lego sets and has done several of the larger ones, however, this one has a special place in her heart! She loves the meticulousness of large lego sets along with their beautiful instruction books. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Farque'

customer_reviews.title: Loved this creator set and the final product t is beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it and was able to build the same without help in 2 weeks by putting 2 hrs per day.
customer_reviews.author: Veneet Katyal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: Was so thrilled to see the Taj Mahal come back as a Lego set. Bought this for my son’s 11th birthday. He put it together in 2 days flat, all on his own! He loves it, I love it and everyone that comes home loves it!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and A Great Activity to Work On!
customer_reviews.text: I got this massive lego set for my 4 boys and myself to do together. We absolutely loved working on it! It became a family project where when each of us had time we'd go do a packet. Between work and school, our schedules are quite hectic so the project took about 1.5 months to complete but that was solely due to our slow pace no to mention the 2 year old lost a couple lego pieces which were found a week later. We worked at a slow pace but really enjoyed building this set. Now I have to buy a nice display table so I can showcase this beauty!
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: Just fair warning - this is really big. If you’re planning to display it when done, find a large area. Not going to fit on a bookshelf.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and impressive, but kind of boring.
customer_reviews.text: The biggest part of this for me was the pride in finishing it. Actually building it was quite boring, because it's mostly the same stuff over and over again. Still great quality, though!
customer_reviews.author: Kell Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price you can find cheaper almost $100 cheaper on secondhand sites new
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning just because it’s so big I don’t even know where to put it for the price it’s just too much you’re better off finding it second hand for 300 bucks instead of spending 400
customer_reviews.author: Dabloesco

customer_reviews.title: About to start.. to be updated!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t started ..YET. I feel like I’m about to build the actual Taj Mahal. So many pieces.. I CAN’T WAIT!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My sixteen year old grandson's favorite Christmas present. He sent me photo's of all stages of construction.
customer_reviews.author: m nichols

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: It was my Xmas gift, but the entire family spent an evening or 2 building it. Everyone pitched in, and it was a fun way to involve everyone. And it looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: R. Patrick Baugh

customer_reviews.title: gotta love Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: The Taj Mahal Lego set arrived very quickly I can't wait to begin to build it. The box was not sealed well. The bottom had no tape, it was just folded together. I'm surprised it didn't fall out.
customer_reviews.author: KELLEY ANN PIEKAREK

customer_reviews.title: this will keep you busy!
customer_reviews.text: the likeness is uncanny. this model is very impressive. however, i bought it while in a nostalgic mindset wanting a grand lego puzzle. well, this thing when finished is massive. what am i going to do with it now?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lego set
customer_reviews.text: It is a really good product I got it for my nine-year-old’s birthday he loved it he also builds Legos a lot so it was the perfect gift it was 16+ years but my son builds really advanced Legos so I decided to get it for him he also really wanted it and overall it is a really good product
customer_reviews.author: catherine z.

customer_reviews.title: Zero Quality Control - Missing Several Pieces
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited to purchase this item. We saved up for it. When we began building it, there were more than 10 pieces missing. We could not believe it. This was to be our "quarantine" distraction. Instead, it added to the misery. Sad day, especially because we really held LEGO in high regard.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah-Michelle Stearns

customer_reviews.title: pretty but unstable.  not worth time assembling.
customer_reviews.text: project not as difficult as number of pieces suggest. problem is although end result is pretty building is unstable. roof of center piece is unstable because there are just too may points that need attaching which result in roof not being straight. also diagram of top of center dome is confusing as diagrams put too many steps together. base of center dome is not designed properly. it comes loose after attaching top portion. the little towers should have been put on last as they keep falling off. they should have redesigned to make it more stable.
customer_reviews.author: polak

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy when Completed
customer_reviews.text: This picture is exactly what you get. Many steps in the build are the same so it goes faster then you would think for size of the lego set. The end result is nice, but really heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Roland

customer_reviews.title: Pieces missing that made the whole set worthless
customer_reviews.text: I would give zero star. I am extremely disappointed with the product, after spending almost 400 dollars the LEGO set is missing pieces without which the whole thing is useless and basically the vendor just stole the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shenaz

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful.easy to make as instructions were easy to follow
customer_reviews.author: Chaki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome build!
customer_reviews.text: My son (8) had a blast assembling this set. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan Debideen

customer_reviews.title: Great time occupier!
customer_reviews.text: Great LEGO set. Great challenge for teenager on a couple of vacation days.
customer_reviews.author: Deneane M.

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! It's huge with tons of tiny pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Holly and Mark Needham

customer_reviews.title: how to install LEDs
customer_reviews.text: My set came with LEDs, but no instructions for how to install. Any ideas?
customer_reviews.author: km

product_meta.title: LEGO Creator Expert Taj Mahal 10256 Building Kit and Architecture Model, Perfect Set for Older Kids and Adults (5923 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Build and discover the LEGO Creator Expert Taj Mahal. The huge ivory-white marble mausoleum, located in the Indian city of Agra is renowned as one of the world’s architectural wonders. It was commissioned in 1631 by the Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his wife, the Empress Mumtaz Mahal. This relaunched 2008 LEGO interpretation features the structure’s 4 facades with sweeping arches, balconies and arched windows. The central dome, subsidiary domed chambers and surrounding minarets are topped with decorative finials, and the raised platform is lined with recessed arches. This is so much more than a toy, it is the perfect model for kids and adults who are into architecture and want to build one of the seven wonders of the world. The model is finished with ornate detailing throughout and intricate tilework around the base. With more than 10,000 pieces, this scale model building is designed to deliver a rewarding assembly experience for adults and makes a great display piece for the home or office. The perfect gift for adults and expert builders who wants to spend hours of fun building this unique large architectural model.
feature_bullets: Take your architectural admiration of the Taj Mahal to the next level! Build the LEGO replica of one of the seven wonders of the world with this building kit for kids and adults. Perfect assembly gift for older kids and adults whether they're 16 years old or 60!

Includes over 10,000 LEGO pieces. The building blocks to create one of the world's most famous landmarks. Adult model kits are more popular than ever. Fun, challenging, and just as impressive as the real thing.
Awaken the architect inside with this assembly toy. The Taj Mahal model features a wealth of rich details, including sweeping arches, ornate domes, soaring minarets and decorative finials.
The LEGO Taj Mahal expert building kit can be build together with all other original LEGO sets and LEGO bricks, including other collectible building kits.
Measures over 16” (43cm) high, 20” (51cm) wide and 20” (51cm) deep

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars95 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
